programme.title: Pregnant Pause (1)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E24, Carrie discovers that she's pregnant, and she's panicked that the timing is wrong. Meanwhile, Deacon and Kelly begin to reconcile.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (2)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E25, Doug tells Carrie not to panic about having the baby, that he will take care of all her "burden," so he takes on a second job so that they can store a little extra money before the due date.

programme.title: Walk, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E01, In an effort to spend more time with Carrie, Doug hires someone (Nicole Sullivan) to take Arthur for a walk three times a week.

programme.title: Sight Gag
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E02, Doug uses a two-for-one coupon to give Carrie a gift of corneal surgery which results in her temporary blindness.

programme.title: Mean Streak
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E03, Doug prepares to break the record for the most consecutive deliveries without incident; Arthur asks Holly to play in Scrabble tournament.

programme.title: Friender Bender
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E04, Doug and Carrie's friendship with Deacon and Kelly is tested after Doug is distracted and backs into their car.

programme.title: No Retreat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E05, Arthur is left to fend for himself when Doug and Carrie go on her company retreat with a group of boring lawyers.

programme.title: Ticker Treat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E06, Doug's Halloween decorations put Arthur in the hospital; Deacon doesn't like Kirby's choice of a Halloween costume.

programme.title: Lyin' Hearted
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E07, Doug runs into a business acquaintance while bringing Arthur to the hospital for heart surgery; Carrie discovers an old college acceptance letter.

programme.title: Life Sentence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E08, Doug and his friends become victims of reality TV when Doug sets up a camera in the basement to keep an eye on Arthur.

programme.title: Veiled Threat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E09, Doug and Carrie experience a flashback to their wedding day after finding a piece of wedding cake in their freezer.

programme.title: Oxy Moron
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E10, Doug tries to prove he would protect Carrie in a life-or-death situation after he makes a dumb move while on a rough plane ride.

programme.title: Depo Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E11, Carrie asks Doug to be a witness at her boss's trial, but then fears he won't be professional in the courtroom.

programme.title: Ovary Action
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E12, The holidays and Doug's parents descend on the household as Doug and Carrie attempt to conceive a baby.

programme.title: Food Fight
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E13, Carrie grows jealous when Spence's girlfriend (Christine Nelson) recruits Doug to test her culinary homework.

programme.title: Double Downer
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E14, Doug spoils Carrie's plans for a romantic weekend when he organizes an outing to Atlantic City -- and his boss ends up joining them.

programme.title: Dougie Nights
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E15, Doug becomes addicted to the night life after he agrees to go club hopping with Deacon to help snap him out of his depression.

programme.title: No Orleans
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E16, Doug and Carrie sneak off to New Orleans after having promised his cousins they would never travel there without them. Peter Scolari guest stars.

programme.title: Missing Links
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E17, Carrie and Doug try to find a date for Deacon so they can all golf together as a foursome at the country club.

programme.title: Hero Worship
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E18, Doug's uncle (guest star Gavin MacLeod) offers financial backing when Doug expresses a desire to open a sandwich shop.

programme.title: Screwed Driver
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E19, Doug starts acting like a child when Carrie goes on a business trip and his parents come for a visit.

programme.title: Lush Life
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E20, Doug tries to get Carrie drunk so he can cheat on his diet, but things get out of hand. Lou Ferrigno guest stars.

programme.title: Bun Dummy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E21, Doug hates Carrie's new hairstyle but can't bring himself to tell her the truth; Spence dreads an upcoming reunion with a former teacher.

programme.title: Patrons Ain't
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E22, When their accountant makes them feel guilty about their lack of charitable donations, Doug and Carrie decide to make a large donation to a school library.

programme.title: Eddie Money
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E23, Doug tries to keep $5,000 in gambling winnings a secret from Carrie, who didn't want him betting to begin with; Carrie is offered a new job. Eddie Money guest stars.

programme.title: Two Thirty
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E24, When Doug goes to Dr. Farber (Tim Matheson) for a root canal, he finds out Carrie used to have a major crush on the dentist.

programme.title: Shrink Wrap
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E25, Carrie and Doug send Arthur to a psychiatrist (William Hurt), to whom he reveals his relationship with his father (Ben Stiller).

programme.title: Window Pain
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E01, Carrie becomes obsessed with trying to convince the new neighbors that she and Doug don't constantly fight.

programme.title: Arthur, Spooner
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E02, Team leader Carrie grows frustrated with her drab work group; Doug begins relying on Arthur's company in order to fall asleep.

programme.title: Kirbed Enthusiasm
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E03, Doug agrees to try out for a semiprofessional football league if Kirby will stay with peewee football.

programme.title: Holy Mackerel
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E04, Carrie's prayer for a raise is miraculously answered while in church, prompting her and Doug to start asking God to grant wishes.

programme.title: Jung Frankenstein
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E05, Carrie gives Doug's therapist (guest star Dave Foley) a laundry list of bad habits to work on. Arthur fights an addiction to nasal spray.

programme.title: Mammary Lane
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E06, Carrie baby-sits for the boss' son; Doug tries to make friends with the new shoe girl (Rachel Dratch) at the bowling alley.

programme.title: Business Affairs
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E07, Doug gets jealous of Carrie's gay co-worker; both Doug and Carrie worry about the strength of their marriage as they sign a 30-year mortgage plan.

programme.title: Flash Photography
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E08, As a joke, Doug takes a lewd picture with a disposable camera on the table at a wedding. David Eigenberg guest stars.

programme.title: Flame Resistant
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E09, Carrie finds out Doug's high-school sweetheart (guest star Lola Glaudini) still keeps in touch with his mother.

programme.title: Dog Bites Cliff

programme.title: Dinner At Eight-Ish
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E20, The regulars meet over dinner to discuss Frasier asking Lilith to move in.

programme.title: Simon Says
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E21, Diane and Sam are given a bleak prognosis from a noted marriage counselor.

programme.title: The Godfather (Part III)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E22, Sam flips out when his goddaughter visits and agrees to move in with Woody.

programme.title: Cheers: The Motion Picture

programme.title: A House Is Not A Home

programme.title: I Do, Adieu
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E26, With Sam and Diane's wedding day approaching, big questions still loom.

programme.title: Home Is The Sailor

programme.title: "I" On Sports
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E02, Sam accepts an offer from his friend, sportscaster Dave Richards.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 1)

programme.desc: Cheers, S06E04, Carla and Eddie dismiss the unfortunate events that occurred before the wedding as just bad luck.

programme.title: The Crane Mutiny
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E05, Frasier tells his friends about a recent argument with Lilith.

programme.title: Paint Your Office
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E06, Norm agrees to paint Rebecca's office in return for running up his tab.

programme.title: The Last Angry Mailman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E07, Cliff tries to save his childhood home from getting bulldozed.

programme.title: Bidding On The Boys

programme.title: Pudd'nhead Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E09, Woody finds a new admirer when he portrays Mark Twain as an understudy.

programme.title: A Kiss Is Still A Kiss
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E10, Sam encourages Rebecca to tell her boss she has a crush on him.

programme.title: My Fair Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E11, Cliff gives his girl a makeover and ends up losing her to every other guy.

programme.title: Christmas Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E12, Sam buys a last minute Christmas gift for Rebecca from another shopper.

programme.title: Woody For Hire Meets Norman Of The Apes
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E13, Robert Urich visits Cheers when Woody makes his television debut.

programme.title: And God Created Woodman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E14, Sam and Woody take the rap for Rebecca when she breaks a priceless vase.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Cuties
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E15, Carla gives birth to twins, a boy and girl. During Carla's absence, the bar hires two waitresses.

programme.title: Yacht Of Fools
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E16, Mr. Drake invites Sam and Rebecca for a weekend on his yacht. Rebecca still pines for Mr. Drake.

programme.title: To All The Girls I've Loved Before
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E17, Frasier second-guesses his wedding when the guys throw him a bachelor party.

programme.title: Let Sleeping Drakes Lie
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E18, Rebecca gets caught snooping in Evan's room when he returns from Europe early.

programme.title: Airport V
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E19, Eddie becomes an ice skater in a penguin suit for ice shows, and invites Carla to see the show in Seattle.

programme.title: The Sam In The Grey Flannel Suit
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E20, Rebecca learns Sam was promoted solely to help the softball team win.

programme.title: Our Hourly Bread
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E21, Woody and Sam want a raise, but the bar's takings have been declining for three months.

programme.title: Slumber Party Massacred
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E22, Carla's depressed when she learns she's going to be a grandmother.

programme.title: Bar Wars
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E23, Sam and his Cheers gang have lost 173 sporting competitions to their rival, Gary and Gary's Old Town Tavern.

programme.title: The Big Kiss-Off
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E24, Sam and Woody make a bet that they can kiss Rebecca before midnight.

programme.title: Back Seat Becky, Up Front
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E25, Rebecca finds out Evan is moving to Tokyo and bringing another woman along.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

RISING TIDES, S05E03, The next generation of Earth observation satellites are now in place maintaining the continuity of long-term climate data, in particular the planets rising temperatures and related ocean levels.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Fresh Eyes
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Fresh Eyes, S04E06, Two new space telescopes are in orbit and completing their shakedown; Gaia and TESS they too will be joined by the James Webb Telescope.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Cosmic Collisions, S03E08, Cosmic and x rays, these mysterious and highly powerful particles from deep space are being investigated to finally discover where they come from.

programme.title: Heavy Lift
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Heavy Lift, S04E08, New heavy lift rockets are taking to the sky. Falcon Heavy, SLS, Arianne 6 and Vega C rockets are primed to begin the next phase of space expansion.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: Redneck Retribution
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E57, A mistress hires a group of derelicts to kill the wife of her lover. Later, she plays the victim and denies any involvement.

programme.title: The Devil Next Door
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E62, A look at a woman who was murdered inside her rural Louisiana home.

programme.title: Its Raining Mannequins
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E45, Dead women and mutilated mannequins pop up in a Texas town. And it will take a broken window, a pizza box, and a few stray hairs to track down a homicidal postman.

programme.title: Last Curtain
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E15, Faced with mounting debts and his upcoming honeymoon, a delusional bloodthirsty actor casts himself in a role that includes murder and dismemberment.

programme.title: Mommie Dearest
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E10, A woman is bludgeoned to death in her own home, and her severely handicapped teenage daughter goes missing. When investigators eventually catch up with the young woman, they hear a baffling story of a mother's toxic love.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E16, An anti-drug crusader's home is torched. But when a body is discovered in the freezer, the curious case of arson becomes a twisted tale of fratricide.

programme.title: Emoji Overkill
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E27, A Texas father takes his spoiled teenage daughter to an exclusive Caribbean resort and somehow ends up packed in his own suitcase.

programme.title: Olympic Bomber
programme.desc: Forensic Factor, S01E24, The Summer Olympics in Atlanta, Georgia are rocked by a massive pipe bomb explosion. Police have no clue who is behind the bombings until they receive a letter signed by "The Army of God," an anti-abortion, anti-gay, white supremacist group.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Forensic Factor, S01E29, Using state-of-the-art forensics, police identify the body as that of a suburban wife and mother of two. Determined to find the killer, police dig further into the victim’s life, doggedly tracking down a former lover in New York City.

programme.title: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Murder Chose Me, S01E03, Rod must locate the body of a missing sailor in order to find his murderer.

programme.title: My First Homicide
programme.desc: Murder Chose Me, S01E08, Rookie detective Rod Demery solves the first homicide of his career.

programme.title: Lester Street One Hour Version
programme.desc: After the First 48, S02E06, In September of 2010, Jessie Dotson went on trial for one of the worst mass murders in Memphis history. He wasn't accused of killing strangers--he was brother, friend, and uncle to the six people he'd allegedly murdered.

programme.title: Tag Team/Heart of Gold
programme.desc: After the First 48, S03E06, In Memphis, TN, Lt. Caroline Mason revisits the 2007 homicide of a 19-year-old man shot to death during a street fight that got out of hand.

programme.title: No Return
programme.desc: After the First 48, S03E14, A beloved father of three is gunned down outside his home in Atascocita, Texas, during a robbery gone wrong. Investigators catch a lucky break with a surprise piece of evidence.

programme.title: The Abduction of Alicia Kozakiewicz
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S01E103, The story of how the Pittsburgh Police and the FBI harnessed cyber forensics to locate missing 13-year-old Alicia Kozakiewicz who had been abducted by 38-year-old Scott Tyree.

programme.title: The Butcher of Louisiana
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S01E108, The story of how a deeply disturbed and twisted serial killer was stopped in his tracks by the tire mark he left at the scene of one of his crimes.

programme.title: Jennifer
programme.desc: Cruise Ship Killers, S02E13, A writer goes on a holiday cruise with her husband to celebrate their one-year anniversary. After she goes missing, security footage shows her falling overboard, leaving everyone to wonder who or what sent her over the edge.

programme.title: Darla
programme.desc: Cruise Ship Killers, S02E04, Recently retired newly weds embark on their third tropical cruise in less than year. The happy and fun loving couple are enjoying the adventures and romance of this new chapter when tragedy strikes and they are found dead in their cabin.

programme.title: Slip of the Tongue
programme.desc: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen, S03E02, The brutal shooting of Stephen Perret looks like a mob hit. Police have little evidence, but soon discover Stephen made a call just before he was murdered. Chris tracks down the person Stephen called... who reveals the identity of his killer.

programme.title: Cherokee
programme.desc: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen, S03E07, The body of 20-year-old Sophia Arnold is found on the banks of the Mississippi River. Police interview two men whose stories don't match up. Chris Hansen unfolds the horrific truth... and discovers which one of them murdered Sophia - and why.

programme.title: Journey To Babel
programme.desc: Star Trek: The Original Series, S02E10, Tensions run high when the Enterprise transports ambassadors to the Babel conferences.

programme.title: Friday's Child
programme.desc: Star Trek: The Original Series, S02E11, The Enterprise crew becomes embroiled in a local power struggle on a tribal planet.

programme.title: The Deadly Years
programme.desc: Star Trek: The Original Series, S02E12, A landing party, including the command staff, is infected with a disease that causes rapid aging and senility.

programme.title: Episode 1

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space, S01E02, A recovered Doctor escapes the hospital and joins UNIT in their investigation. Meanwhile, Channing directs one of his Auton servants to recover a meteorite.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space, S01E03, Sam Seeley has found one of the meteorites but the Autons want it back and are closing in. General Scobie visits Auto Plastics, playing into the hands of Channing.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space, S01E04, The invasion begins as Auton shop dummies come to life and attack the public. The Doctor and UNIT infiltrate Auto Plastics where the Doctor faces the Nestene consciousness.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E01, UNIT is at a project run by Professor Stahlman who intends to penetrate Earth’s crust. But the drilling has already released something deadly from beneath the Earth’s surface.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E02, The green slime oozing from the drill head is transforming men into monsters. Stahlman refuses to listen to the warnings and resorts to sabotage so that his project may continue.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E03, Transported to a parallel world, the Doctor discovers that England is under military rule and the drilling project is at a more advanced stage.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E04, In the parallel world, the drilling project is about to penetrate the Earth’s crust. The Doctor, arrested as a spy, is unable to convince his captors of the danger that faces them.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E05, In the parallel world, Earth’s crust has been penetrated, releasing terrible forces from within the Earth. The Doctor must escape back to his world to prevent the same catastrophe.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E06, As the Earth in the parallel world faces destruction, the Doctor is desperate to return to his world to warn them of the danger. But time is running out.

programme.title: Part 7
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E07, The Doctor has escaped the doomed, parallel Earth and has returned to his own world where he attempts to put a halt to the drilling project.

programme.title: Episode 1

programme.title: Episode 2

programme.title: Episode 3

programme.title: Episode 4

programme.title: Episode 5

programme.title: Episode 6

The Keller Machine breaks free of the Doctor's restraining device and the Doctor has no choice but to turn the parasite against the Master.

programme.title: Part 1

programme.title: Part 3

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E3005, A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Mighty Jack
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mighty Jack, S01E14, A secret organization called Mighty Jack (1968) uses a submarine to battle a terrorist organization. Joel and the Bots make a Mighty Jack pet food commercial and sing the song "Slow The Plot Down!".

programme.title: Crash of the Moons
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Crash of the Moons, S04E24, The crew pokes fun at another segment of a 1960s episode of General Hospital (1963) before watching an astronaut attempt to stop two planets from colliding with each other in Crash of the Moons.

programme.title: Samson vs. The Vampire Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Samson vs. The Vampire Women, S06E25, While Mike and the Bots wrestle with Santo Versus the Vampire Women, TV's Frank is assumed into Second Banana Heaven, leaving no one for Dr. Forrester to kill.

programme.title: Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray, S06E20, A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.

programme.title: Crash of the Moons
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Crash of the Moons, S04E24, The crew pokes fun at another segment of a 1960s episode of General Hospital (1963) before watching an astronaut attempt to stop two planets from colliding with each other in Crash of the Moons.
MST3K: The Painted Hills, 20170901070000 +0000, A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.
MST3K: The Horror Of Party Beach, 19970906000000 +0000, Pearl and Observer are in Ancient Rome pretending to be gods as Mike and the 'bots watch The Horror of Party Beach (1964).
MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians, 19911221000000 +0000, Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

The Valley of Light, 20070128000000 +0000, A World War II veteran returns home in search of a place to belong. Stars Chris Klein, Gretchen Mol, Zach Mills, Jay O. Sanders, Jeff Perry, Geoff Pierson, Stephen Tobolowsky and Robert Prosky. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

To Dance with the White Dog, 19931205000000 +0000, An unusual love story in which a strange white dog appears and helps Sam Peek, a Georgia tree farmer, cope with the loss of his wife, Cora. Stars Hume Cronyn and Jessica Tandy. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

While You Were Dating, 20170212000000 +0000, A divorced couple meet online and end up going on a blind date together. After an awkward reunion, they decide to set each other up with their friends, but old habits never quite die. Stars Billy Baldwin and Stefanie VonPfetten.

Mr. Hockey: The Gordie Howe Story, 20130514000000 +0000, The story of Gordie Howe's famed return to hockey at age 45, playing professionally alongside his 18- and 19-year-old sons, a comeback that brought his family together and remains one of the most legendary in hockey history.

Missing Pieces, 20000206000000 +0000, A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
In Love and War, 19970124000000 +0000, A captured British Soldier and a courageous Italian woman fall in love in war-torn Italy during the Nazi occupation. Stars Callum Blue and Barbora Bobulova.

Hello, It's Me, 20150927000000 +0000, A woman coping with the loss of her husband and the task of raising two children on her own meets a handsome, rich man but doesn't feel right about pursuing anything. Stars Kellie Martin and Kavan Smith.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E07, Arriving on New Athos for an overnight visit, Teyla and Dr. Keller discover the entire settlement abandoned and their own lives in jeopardy from the Bola Kai, a fierce warrior tribe. The pair must avoid capture until Atlantis sends a search party.

programme.title: The Seer
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E08, With still no trace of the Athosians, Teyla requests an off-world visit to meet with a seer, Davos, who may be able to help her find her people. Meanwhile on Atlantis, Agent Woolsey arrives to observe and review Col. Carter.

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E09, After working for countless hours on the Replicator coding, Dr. McKay reluctantly admits that he needs help from his sister, Jeanie. But she goes missing, McKay travels to Earth determined to find her and uncover who is behind the kidnapping.

programme.title: This Mortal Coil
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E10, As Dr. McKay struggles to figure out why the stargate has been inoperable, a mysterious probe plunges into the city. A sweep of the probe offers McKay a shocking glimpse of nanite code before his diagnostic program crashes and all the data is lost.

programme.title: Be All My Sins Remember'd
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E11, Armed with the means to track Replicator ships, the Atlantis team strives to eliminate the Replicators once and for all. Now, the team rushes to evacuate those human settlements in the path of the advancing Replicator forces.

programme.title: Spoils Of War
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E12, The Atlantis long-range sensors detect the signal of a subspace tracking device familiar to Dr. McKay. The team follows to signal to a damaged hive ship drifting in space. Amidst the ship’s records, they discover references to a secret Wraith base.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E17, Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliance’s secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E20, The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

programme.title: Enigma
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E17, The SG-1 team rescues a group of highly developed survivors from the cataclysmic planet of Tollan. To stop the legendary knowledge of the Tollan people from falling into the wrong hands, O'Neill and his team stake all on the cross-universal rescue.

programme.title: Solitudes
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E18, Following a Stargate technical defect, O'Neill and Carter find themselves stranded on an icy wasteland. O'Neill is severely wounded, both are freezing to death, and nobody can find the section of the universe in which they are stranded!

programme.title: Tin Man
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E19, Upon landing on Planet PX3 989, the mysterious alien Harlan renders the SG-1 team unconscious. After waking and returning to Earth, they find that their spirits and minds have been transferred to androids. Can the team regain their bodies and souls?

programme.title: There But For The Grace Of God
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E20, A mysterious mirror transports Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) to another dimension. Suddenly he finds himself on an alternate Earth that is under attack from the Goa'uld. Can he return to his dimension and save the world?

programme.title: Politics
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E21, Only Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) knows of the Goa'uld plans to invade Earth. But no one takes his warnings seriously - in fact, this time the authorities have chosen to terminate the costly Stargate program and close the gate forever.

programme.title: Within The Serpent's Grasp
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E22, To stop the Goa'uld invasion, the SG-1 team disobeys orders and transports itself to the Goa'uld attack headquarters. Landing amidst preparations for an all-out strike on Earth, the way home is blocked. Can the team avert disaster and save humanity?

programme.title: The Serpent's Lair
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E01, When a fleet of Goa'uld warships launches a surprise attack, the SG-1 team uses the Stargate to board an enemy ship with enough explosives to destroy the alien force. But the team's capture suddenly turns their objective into a suicide mission!

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E005, Where there's smoke, there's fire, in Kelly's opinion... at least where Valerie is concerned.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E010, As Dylan lies in a coma fighting for his life, he experiences a number of bizarre dreams involving Erica, his drug dealer, and his dead father.

programme.title: Alone At The Top
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E022, As the new owner of the After Dark, Valerie uses her newfound leverage to force Ray to continue their affair. But Ray has never been one to follow orders.
